content.raw:
1. ya.. maybe support changing the sampling rate in the short term and dynamic disk read/write in long term will help make this happen

1. will need to think about this a bit more. Mainly need to come up with a nice solution that lets user zoom while the x-axis is being updated.

1. added this function in a different branch, will come in the next PR

1. mm I don't see this on my machine.

1. yes agreed, in TODO list

1. I think because QDialog and the QMessagebox both have the `WindowStaysOnTopHint` which causes them to not overlap. I'll play around with it a bit more later when addressing other UI issues.

  2. will need to think about this a bit more. Mainly need to come up with a nice solution that lets user zoom while the x-axis is being updated.

  6. I think because QDialog and the QMessagebox both have the WindowStaysOnTopHint which causes them to not overlap. I'll play around with it a bit more later when addressing other UI issues.
